attributes.action: The Erasmus project threatened because of Brexit and article 50's will
attributes.background: Now, as the article 50 was triggered, the Erasmus project (consists in sending students to a european country to study abroad) is threatened because of Brexit. If the project isn't allowed, then the slogan of the Prime Minister :"A country that works for everyone" would not work for students.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
